title: Qulay avtomobil bron qilish xizmati
description: 5 daqiqa oldin yetib kelish o‘z vaqtida kelgan hisoblanadi.
route_1: Nha Trang (markaz, janubiy yo‘nalish) ↔ Cam Ranh aeroporti
route_2: Nha Trang (markaz, janubiy yo‘nalish) ↔ Cam Ranh kurorti (Movenpick, Wyndham Garden va boshqalar)
route_3: Nha Trang (shimoliy yo‘nalish) ↔ Cam Ranh aeroporti
route_4: Nha Trang (shimoliy yo‘nalish) ↔ Cam Ranh kurorti (Movenpick, Wyndham Garden va boshqalar)
address: Manzil: 7B Bach Dang ko‘chasi, Nha Trang shahri, Vetnam
bonus_items: Telefon, dinamik va zaryad portini bepul tozalash
Magsafe qopqog‘i yoki KingKong himoya oynasi bir marta bepul
download_qr: QR kod muvaffaqiyatli yuklab olindi. Ilovaga kirib skanerlab mashina bron qiling!
